title: FindLaw Directory Scraper
description: Extract lawyer and law firm data from FindLaw.com directory listings. Provide one or more direct FindLaw directory URLs.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of FindLaw directory URLs to scrape (e.g., https://lawyers.findlaw.com/bankruptcy-law/california/). Add multiple URLs to scrape different practice areas or locations.

collectDetails.title: Collect Detail Page Data
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper will visit each lawyer's profile page to extract additional information (bio, team members, practice areas). This provides richer data but takes longer.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of lawyer/firm listings to extract per URL. Leave empty to collect all available listings.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of directory pages to visit per URL. Prevents excessive crawling.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
